original_text: There are wicked men among my people. They like to catch people and rob them. They hide like someone who wants to catch a bird. They put out their traps to kill what they want. There are wicked men among my people.
korean_text: 내 백성 가운데 악인이 있어서 새 사냥꾼이 매복함 같이 지키며 덫을 놓아 사람을 잡으며

sentences.original_text: There are wicked men among my people
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성 중에 악한 자들이 있다

sentences.original_text: They like to catch people and rob them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람을 붙잡고 빼앗는 것을 좋아한다

sentences.original_text: They hide like someone who wants to catch a bird
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 새를 잡고 싶어하는 사람처럼 숨는다

sentences.original_text: They put out their traps to kill what they want
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 원하는 것을 죽이기 위해 덫을 놓는다

sentences.original_text: There are wicked men among my people
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성 중에 악한 자들이 있다
